Ian is awesome.  I loved his class because it was fun and easy.  He grades fair and loves to teach.  If you have the chance, get into his section.
Great teacher, very funny and knowledgeable. Highly recommended
Great guy. Very funny!! He makes class fun and woth while. Take him if you can.

Ian is super fun and really makes getting up for an 8:30am class worth it.  He is super fun and makes the material seem much easier and relatable.  The homework is SUPER easy but he does collect it, so you have to make sure to do it.
He made this a really great class! I actually looked forward to going. He's a lot of fun, but honestly wants you to learn something too. Definitely take him if you can!
Tippets is awesome.  The best spanish teacher I've ever had.  He's easy going, funny, and very smart.  As long as you're not a fan of the Utah Utes, you'll get along with him.

summary_comment: Professor Rodriguez is highly regarded for her intelligence and dedication to her students' learning beyond mere content. Her classes are challenging but rewarding, fostering valuable life skills that transcend specific subjects. Despite offering minimal guidance on assignments and sometimes vague responses to questions, she is widely praised for her insightful perspective and teaching ability.
summary_comment_short: Professor Rodriguez is highly regarded for her deep intelligence and commitment to educating beyond mere content, making her classes challenging yet rewarding. Her teaching style, while sometimes lacking in clear direction, is praised for its depth and the lifelong skills it imparts, though students note a high drop rate initially.

Ratings.comment: very little direction with assignments, answers questions vaguely.

She is an extremely intelligent woman and very interested in helping her students learn more than just content and facts.  Class is difficult but very rewarding in that it teaches skills that will remain useful throughout life and in any language.  Majority of the class will bail after the first week. Grow a pair and take it.  You won't regret it.
One of the most intelligent professors you'll find. She has such an interesting history and viewpoint, I highly recommend her.
I Love her, Love her, Love her...couldn't ask for a better one
Great!
beautiful way of seeing things, great, great lady, take a course with her.
The smartest teacher I have had.  She really opened my eyes to a new way of seeing the world.
great teacher very helpful as far as what is on test made quarter somewhat enjoyable

summary_comment: Professor Shelton is highly regarded for her engaging and humorous teaching style, which makes the class enjoyable and effective. Despite being a strict grader and speaking quickly, students find her genuinely interested in their learning and recommend her enthusiastically.
summary_comment_short: Professor Shelton is highly regarded for her engaging and humorous teaching style, which makes the class enjoyable and memorable. Despite being a strict grader and speaking quickly, she is considered an excellent instructor due to her genuine interest in her students and unique personality.

Ratings.comment: She's a great professor! I enjoyed her class a lot. She's genuinely interested in her students. She's also very funny. Definitely my favorite teacher I've had in a while.
great teacher. loved her personality, absolutely unique. very funny gal. she's hilarious especially when she acts stuff out to explain it. i felt like i had fun and learned a lot too. recommended.
Strict grader, talks fast, if you can get past that she is a great person.
No Comments

summary_comment: Professor Lucchin is highly regarded for her engaging and supportive teaching style, making her classes enjoyable and informative. Students appreciate her efforts to ensure understanding and the additional opportunities for extra credit through class participation. While some note occasional lackluster days, the overall consensus is that she is an excellent and caring instructor who fosters a positive learning environment.
summary_comment_short: Professor Lucchin is an excellent and engaging teacher who consistently makes her classes enjoyable and ensures students understand the material. However, her enthusiasm can vary, with some classes feeling more dynamic than others.

Ratings.comment: AWESOME teacher. she was always so helpful and class was always a lot of fun. she made a point to make sure we all understood everything by the end of lecture. she sometimes assigns extra homework that is only announced class (this is for extra points to help your grade!) so coming to class is definitely necessary. loved this class!

She is a fantastic teacher, Language courses are one of those things that you get out of it whatever you put into it for the most part.  So if you just barely show up then you're gonna think its hard.  If you try though, and with her, you'll have a great quarter.  Plus she is unecessarily hot!!!
REALLY GREAT TEACHER...but do your work and study
Nadia is the best teacher I've had at Ohio State! She's so great and really cares about the students. Her classes were molto fun and the class really bonded because of her energy.
really great teacher!  helpful and fun most of the time!!!
Most of the time she was a fun professor, but there were some days that I feel she just went through the motions and had no interest in helping.

great teacher.  material is interesting and she brings up great examples to get the class more excited and involved.  quizzes are easy, but participation/attendance count so go to class, pay attention, and do the workbook and you'll be fine.

summary_comment: Professor Nakatsu is highly regarded for her effective teaching methods and ability to spark interest in linguistics, though her classes require significant time commitment due to challenging homework assignments. Students find her approachable and knowledgeable, with one describing her as "GREAT PROF!" Despite the workload, most recommend her class due to her fairness and clear explanations.
summary_comment_short: Professor Nakatsu is highly regarded for her effective teaching methods and ability to spark interest in linguistics, though students note that the class requires significant time and effort, particularly with the homework assignments. Overall, she is considered a great professor who makes the subject engaging despite the challenging workload.

Ratings.comment: good teacher. i would totally mate with her :p
Awesome professor, there is a lot of work to this class but its worth it.  Its not hard, all the answers are in the book or notes taken in class.  Highly recommended!!
Very tedious class. Homework assignments were unclear and very difficult.
loved her!  made me very interested in linguistics!
GREAT PROF!
She is very good at teaching, but you must spend a lot of time with the 4 HW assignments, but she is a fair grader!  Good luck!

summary_comment: Professor Cheney is highly regarded for her engaging and humorous teaching style, despite an initially intimidating presence. Students find her to be a supportive and effective instructor who makes the material accessible even in a fast-paced class environment. Her classes are praised for their fun and practical approach, with a strong emphasis on interaction and real-world application of the language.
summary_comment_short: Professor Cheney is highly regarded for her engaging and humorous teaching style, despite an initial intimidating presence. Students appreciate her willingness to help and her ability to make the material accessible, though they advise not to be overly sensitive to her tough exterior.

Ratings.comment: Don't let her intimidate you at first. She is actually really nice and has a good sense of humor. You just can't be too sensitive if she picks on you. She is about as hard as other TAs but much more fun and very willing to help. I also have to give her props for her awesome fashion sense and general hotness. I would definitely recommend her.

Don't let her intimidate you at first. She is actually really nice and has a good sense of humor. You just can't be too sensitive if she picks on you. She is about as hard as other german TAs but much more fun and very willing to help. I also have to give her props for her awesome fashion sense and general hotness. I would definitely recommend her.

It is a very fast paced class but she made it very easy. She prides herself on being mean. Shes great as long as youre not super sensitive. Very laid back. Absolute favorite teacher by far I've had here. Tests, quizzes, and HW are cake. As long you keep up, easy A.

I took the 102.66 class and it was very fast paced, but with any prior german experience not very challenging. Although with no extra credit an A was hard to get, yet not unattainable. Study daily for pop up quizzes that end up being 15% of your grade, but the test were so easy with examples for all activities. She says she is not nice, but she is.

She is an AWESOME teacher. i seriously loved this class. Made my interest in becomming a German major complete. She has a very sarcastic and fun sense of humor. She's very young and has some attitude but in a completely acceptable way. She has complete control over the class and is very willing to help. 102.66 with her was a great experience.

Addie is intimidating at first, but she is a great teacher with a love for the subject. She teaches for the test, but likes to throw in extra stuff just for fun. She loves to do practice roleplays and activities but rarely does pre-recorded listening exercises. An excellent teacher; I would try to get her more than once.
No Comments

AWESOME GTA!!!  We probably spoke more german in my 101 class than in my 104 class.  She has great control over a classroom and will make a fantastic professor one day.  Additionally, by far the hottest TA I've ever had...huge crush on her :)
No Comments

summary_comment: Professor Corl is highly regarded for her engaging and enjoyable teaching style, which challenges students to think critically and expand their vocabulary. Her patience and ability to maintain interest through interactive activities are particularly noted. While some find her classes best suited for beginners due to her thorough approach, her passion for the subject and supportive nature are universally praised.
summary_comment_short: Professor Corl is highly regarded for her engaging and enjoyable teaching style, which challenges students to think critically and expand their vocabulary. Her patience and use of interactive activities keep classes interesting, and she effectively balances humor with academic rigor.

Ratings.comment: Absolutely one of my favorite professors! Class was fun, interesting and I gained so much more vocabulary. She challenged me to think for myself and offered very helpful constructive criticism. Wonderful advisor as well! I feel much better about speaking and writing German.

I don't recommend this class if you're at a higher level, it was very easy and at times quite boring (unless business is your thing).  She is a very nice person and a great prof. The only thing that bugged me was she would constantly correct someone in mid-speech instead of letting them finish talking then telling them the major error they made.
She was the most patient teacher I have ever had.  The class was kept interesting with her group/ partner activites.  If I had to do it over, I would take her again.

Prof. Corl is an awesome teacher!  She really has a passion for German and she makes classes fun (It's not uncommon for the entire class to be laughing).  I believe she normally teaches higher level courses but she's done a wonderful job!  Thanks!

summary_comment: Professor Bergmann is highly regarded for her approachable and engaging teaching style, often breaking up lectures with group activities to keep classes interesting. While she assigns significant take-home work, including detailed discussion papers (DAPs) and presentations, students find the workload manageable and beneficial for their learning. Her fairness as a grader and willingness to help make her a popular choice among students.
summary_comment_short: Professor Bergmann is highly regarded for her approachable and engaging teaching style, though some find her assignments demanding. She is known for her fairness, willingness to help, and passion for teaching, often breaking up lectures with interactive activities and providing take-home work that supports learning.

Ratings.comment: She was very nice and kept the class relatively interesting. She isn't very clear in what she is asking for her DAPs so be sure to expand even if she doesn't ask to. Very open and helpful. Has a young daughter and loves to talk about her. =)

Professor Bergmann is awesome. She asks for a lot of work, but none of it over the top, and her assingments actually help your quiz grades. No midterm or final, and a ton of extra credit, plus you learn a lot too. If you are willing to do the busy work, the class is well worth it. Plus she brought pizza and cookies to class, what prof does that?!

She is nice, but, there were 3 long, obnoxious homework assignments, yes she does give take home tests, but they take forever to complete! I'd rather have an in-class test that takes an hour than a take-home test that takes several hours. She also makes you do a presentation which sux and she NEVER lets you out early! Take something else!
Shes really nice and very helpful.  If you go to class you will do fine, although you can probably get by simply by reading the book
She's a really great teacher.  Handouts for notes and take home assignments (including exams).  Definately try to take her class!
Anoushka is the cutest little lady ever! She bakes cookies for birthdays and all work is take home (even midterms/exams). She is German but VERY easy to understand.

Anouschka is awesome. She is a very fair grader and teacher. Do the work and the reading and you will have no problem passing the class with an A. She loves to talk and teach so if you are looking to get out of class early look elsewhere.  She is German, but you would never know cause she has no accent at all! SHe is passionate about her teaching!

All the work in the class is take home, making it very easy. She breaks up lectures with many group activies. She does a good job making sure the class is not boring. She is felxible and easy to work with.

summary_comment: Professor Bazgan is highly regarded as an exceptional teacher, known for her friendliness, approachability, and engaging teaching style. Students consistently praise her for her willingness to help and her ability to make the class both enjoyable and educational.
summary_comment_short: Professor Bazgan is highly regarded as an excellent instructor, known for her friendliness, beauty, and engaging teaching style. Students consistently praise her for her willingness to help and her ability to make the class both enjoyable and educational.

Ratings.comment: i loved her. really i did i loved her... likely still do :(
Loved her!!!
Great teacher.
The most gorgeous and friendly teacher on campus. Her class is a lot of fun and she is an incredible teacher.
Really good instructor and always willing to help students out. Learned a great deal from her.
Amazing Teacher and Really HOT!!!!  Do the work and talk in class and you will get an A!!!
No Comments
My favorite teacher ever.  She was so helpful and patient.
She is a great teacher! Very cute.

I have Nicoleta again this quarter and I couldn't have been happier to walk in the door the first day and see she was teaching 104.01.. again, explains everything and will answer any questions, and most importantly, I retain pretty much everything she teaches... she's an excellent teacher!
This lady was awesome.  She helped us in with whatever we didn't understand and was really nice about everything.  I suggest you take a class that she teaches :]
Very interested in teaching and making sure the class understands.  Quizes are EASY! Midterms, you might want to study.  Overall the class was very enjoyable.

I have her right now and I've only been to three lectures but I already enjoy her a lot as a professor. She has a bit of an accent, but it's not hard to understand her at all, and she is also very calm and has a great sense of humor. I think I will learn a lot from her.
I thought this class was really easy, but I took french for a long time. At first i was scared and didn't like her too much, but at the end I really enjoyed the class
